item.title: Russell Sage Dining Hall to Relocate Cashier Station
item.description: Coming Soon! The cashier station for Russell Sage Dining Hall will be relocated to the East entrance of the building. This entrance will also be the designated exit point for leaving Russell Sage Dining Hall. Please note that Simply To Go will continue to be accessed through the West entrance.

item.title: Winter Weather Shuttle Information
item.description: As the season for inclement weather approaches, please be advised that shuttle operations may be impacted by adverse conditions. To ensure the safety of both drivers and passengers, service modifications—including alternate routing, service delays, temporary suspension, or full cancellation—may be implemented as necessary.

item.title: RPI at Work Information Session on November 25
item.description: Date: Tuesday, November 25, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - RPI at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., will be reviewing the online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates. Expect to hear details about how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment. Please RSVP if you plan to attend and learn more about RPI at Work.

item.title: Tech The Halls (11/17-11/22) at Collegiate Store
item.description: It’s time to Tech The Halls! Select technology items are on sale in-store and online from Monday, Nov 17 until Saturday, Nov 22. Customers will get: 5% off Apple M5 MacBook Pro 14-inch and M5 iPad Pro models, 10% off Apple M3 and M4 models - MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, iPad Pro and iPad Air, and 25% off select OnHand and Belkin accessories. There will also be two Accessory One-Day Flash Sales on 11/18 and 11/20. Some exclusions may apply. See store for details. Shop at rensselaerstore.com

item.title: Conversation with Mr. Vito Paladino, President & CEO Volkswagen Canada, President Audi Canada
item.description: Mr. Vito Paladino, President & CEO Volkswagen Canada, President Audi Canada will be in Prof. Shyam Kumar’s Strategy & Policy class at 10:45 on Friday, 11/21 for about an hour via Microsoft Teams. He will talk about the challenges facing the auto industry, and the Audi/VW group’s strategy to compete in this environment. Teams Meeting ID: Meeting ID: 247 503 103 419 84 Passcode: Ti2Zz6sv

item.title: RPI Shuttle Service Announcement
item.description:
Please be advised that there will be no RPI shuttle services from November 24, 2025 through November 29, 2025 in observance of the Thanksgiving break. Regular shuttle operations will resume on November 30, 2025.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
